name: Spanish/English2-Same Spelling, Different Meanings Quiz | World | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
llama.

	A camel's relative is a llama, and "llama" means "you call" in Spanish.

tan.

	Tan is a shade of brown, and means "so" in Spanish.

Once.

	Once is one time, and means "eleven" in Spanish.

questions.text: I put a dog from "101 Dalmatians."
questions.explanation:
Pongo.

	Pongo was a dog in "101 Dalmatians," and also means "I put" in Spanish.

trance.

	A trance is a daze, as well as "a critical moment" in Spanish.

dime.

	A dime is ten cents, and also means "tell me" in Spanish.

dice.

	Dice are used to generate numbers, and "dice" means "it says" in Spanish.

mate.

	Your husband is your mate, and "mate" is the command form of "to kill" in Spanish.

ore.

	Ore is the source of metals, as well as being the command form of "to pray" in Spanish.

come&comes.

	When you get here, you have come, and "come" is "you eat" in Spanish.
